answers.answer: Why so early? Im getting induced Mondaynight
Now they put this stupid balloon in me and it hurts
:( that's no fun. Im getting induced Monday night at 5 pm
I'm sure yours will be better. Are you dilated or effaced at all because I wasn't when they started the induction
Im 1 centimeter dilated last I heard is was 50% effaced. Im getting a pill put inside of me and then first thing Tuesday morning she is coming to break my water
Yeah they immediately started me on pitocin they didn't even try the pill so Idk it just sux lol
Idk when they are starting mine
Yea I wonder if they had this cervadil pill or whatever it is 3 years, so bc I didn't have it I was just induced abd failed to progress so I had a csection.
I thought the contractions were awful even with an epidural I but my husband hand. And of course bc I hit an epidural I couldn't get it off bed :-(
Im gonna try my hardest not to get the epidural

Yes the contractions are worse. Inductions go very well when you are ready but if you are not ready sometimes it ends up in c section. The contractions are a lot worse, I have no problem giving natural labor but, induction I begged for epidural and I could not deal with the pain.

question: Are terrible, but I also don't have anything to compare them to. This is my first baby and I swear these contractions are so bad!!! I came into the hospital for a regular evaluation and ended up getting induced at 36 weeks :(
title: pitocin contractions
